raw_infobox.name: Dwyane Wade
raw_infobox.caption: Wade with the Miami Heat in 2011
raw_infobox.high_school: Harold L. Richards High School(Oak Lawn, Illinois)
raw_infobox.highlights:
* 3× NBA champion (2006, 2012, 2013)
* Bill Russell NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award (2006)
* 13× NBA All-Star (2005–2016, 2019)
* NBA All-Star Game Most Valuable Player Award (2010)
* 2× All-NBA First Team (2008, 2009)
* 3× All-NBA Second Team (2004, 2005, 2010)
* 3× All-NBA Third Team (2006, 2011, 2012)
* 3× NBA All-Defensive Second Team (2004, 2008, 2009)
* List of National Basketball Association annual scoring leaders (2008)
* NBA All-Rookie First Team (2003)
* NBA 75th Anniversary Team
* {{abbr|No.|Number}} 3 Miami Heat#Retired numbers
* Consensus first-team NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans (2003 NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans)
* Third-team NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans – Sporting News (2002 NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans)
* Conference USA Men's Basketball Player of the Year (2003)
* 2× First-team All-Conference USA (2002, 2003)
* No. 3 Marquette Golden Eagles men's basketball#Retired jerseys

personal_info.high_school: Harold L. Richards High School(Oak Lawn, Illinois)
